data.title: Buy Warp Speed - Sega Mega Drive? 100% Gurantee
data.meta_description: Warp Speed and a lot more rare Sega Mega Drive games you buy at Gamewalhalla. 100% guarantee. 2 Games = 1X shipping costs.
data.text:
Gamewalhalla offers a wide range of payment options. When checking out you can choose the payment method that suits you best.

ALL PAYMENTS ARE 100% SECURE!!!

ALL ELECTRONIC PAYMENTS TAKE PLACE IN A SECURED ENVIRONMENT. CARD NUMBERS AND OTHER DATA WILL NOT BE SAVED

ALL ELECTRONIC PAYMENTS ARE PROCESSED BY MOLLIE (mollie.nl). SO IT MAY BE POSSIBLE THAT YOU SEE THIS NAME APPEAR ON YOUR BANK STATEMENTS

All payments are free. We won't charge any payment type fees!!!

Bank Transfer

Place your order on our website and pay afterwards with pc-banking or at the counter of your bank.

After completing your order, you'll receive an email with your order number and all payment info. Please always add this order number in the communication.

BNP Paribas Fortis on the name of Gamewalhalla

BIC: GEBABEBB

IBAN: BE50001602082918

Communication: order number + name of the game

PROCESSING: 1-3 working days depending from which bank the payment comes

Cash

All order can be picked up in our shop where you can pay in cash. Please bring along cash money. We don't have bancontact in our shop. There are several banks nearby if necessary.

MisterCash

When checking out choose to pay by MisterCash if you'd like to pay with your bank card. After entering your card number and expiration date you will be redirected to your trusted banking environment to carry out the payment. Make sure to have your bank card and card reader close at hand.

PROCESSING: immediate payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

KBC Payment Button

If you're already a customer at the KBC bank you can pay by our own bank through this payment option. You'll be redirected to your familiar online banking environment to make the payment. You'll need your bank card and card reader.

PROCESSING: immediat payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

Belfius Payment Button (Belfius Direct Net)

If you're already a customer at the Belfius bank you can pay by our own bank through this payment option. You'll be redirected to your familiar online banking environment to make the payment. You'll need your bank card and card reader.

PROCESSING: immediate payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

Sofortbanking

=

With Sofortbanking you can immediately pay by online bank transfer. You will be redirected to your familiar banking environment to do the payment. You'll need your bank card and card reader.

PROCESSING: immediate payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

Ideal

This payment method is reserved for your customers from Holland.

PROCESSING: immediate payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

Credit Card

Pay with Visa or other credit card. As well for you customer from Belgium, Holland and all other countries.

PROCESSING: immediate payment. Your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly even the very same day if we receive your payment in time.

Choose your preferred shipping option when checking out. The shipping costs depend on the weight/value of your order and to where it needs to be shipped.

Shipping costs consist out of the costs for the packaking materials (bubble envelopes, envelope boxes, carton boxes) and stamps. As a professional seller we're also legally obliged to add 21% of VAT to these cost that we need to pay to the government.

WHY NO FREE SHIPPING AS A LOT OF OTHER WEBSHOPS DO?

Very simple: free shipping doesn't exist. Free shipping means all prices are prices with shipping prices included. If Gamewalhalla would offer free shipping we would be obliged to increase the price of each item with a few euros. So when ordering multiple items you would pay several times the shipping costs.

If you shop regularly at Gamewahalla you may consider buying the Gamewalhalla GO membership. For a fixed price a year you'll recieve free shipping for all your orders. We also have a membership for 3 or 6 months.

Gamewalhalla ships exclusively with Bpost. Everything is sent in bubble envelopes, special envelope boxes, carton boxes,... Items that fit in your mailbox will be sent in a bubble envelope or in a envelope box. Items that don't fit into your mailbox are sent in cardboard boxes.

Gamewalhalla tries to recycle as much materials as possible. This is good for the environment and good for your wallet. Your order may therefor be shipped in a re-used cardboard box. 99% of all filling materials consist out of recycled materials. This may be bubble film that's being re-used, old newspapers,... Gamewalhalla has years of experience in sending parcels. Everything is packed as safely as possible to prevent any damage during shipment.

Belgium

CONSOLIDATION OF YOUR PACKAGES

We know that international shipping can be quite expensive. So for our international customers we offer a special service. We can consolidate your packages. Meaning several orders will be combined into 1 package which will allow a huge saving in shipping costs.

So you could place regular orders on our website and have it shipped all together every 1-2 months. By combining everything into 1 package there will be a huge saving in shipping costs. Please contact us through our contact form for more information.

Rest of Europe/World

Shipping costs depend on the weight/size of your order. When checking out the correct shipping cost will be shown on the screen.

Especially for large orders these shipping costs are estimated shipping costs. The definitive shipping costs will depend of the effective weight. This weight can only be determined after packing your order. A big order? Expensive shipping? Please contact us. It may be possible to send your order cheaper.

Buy 2 Games = Pay 1X for shipping

When buying 2 games in a lot of cases you won't have to pay any extra shipping cost. This will completely depend if your order will fit in your mailbox or not.

Games or combination of games that can be shipped together: PS1, PS2, PS3, Gamecube, Wii, loose carts,... Games that can't be shipped together: CIB games (NES, Snes, N64, Sega), PS1 games with double boxes (e.g. Final Fantasy,...).

Due to their value some games will be shipped as a package even if they fit in the mailbox. By sending them as a package they can be packed a lot more secure and a tracking number will be available.

When will my order be shipped?

After receiving your payment your order will be shipped within 1 working day. Possibly the same day if we receive your payment in time.

How will my order be shipped?

All games are shipped in a protective bubble wrap envelopes or envelope boxes. Things that don't fit in the mailbox will be shipped in a carton box.

Gamewalhalla has years of experience with the shipping of games, consoles and accessories. Everything is securely packed to prevent any damage during shipping.

To which countries does Gamewalhalla ship?

In principle Gamewalhalla ships worldwide. When checking out the right shipping costs will be calculated based on the weight of your order and country of destination. No shipping available to your country? Please contact us.

Is there a tracking number available for my order?

Belgium: standard shipping = without tracking number. All other is with tracking number

Internationally: everthing shipped internationally has a tracking number

If your order is shipped with a tracking number in the email with shipping confirmation you'll find a link to track your order online. If you've created an account on our website you can also find the tracking number in your order history.

Why are the game discs almost always as good as scratch free?

Gamewahalla has a very sophisticated disc repair machine. With this machine we can repair most disc to a almost as new condition. All games on a disc are repaired with this machine before the are being sold. Through our disc repair service we can also repair your discs (cd's, dvd's, blu-rays).

I've ordered a game and now I see it's no longer in stock.

No worries, from a lot of games we only have 1 copy in stock. So when you order a game and you see it's no longer in stock afterwards it's because you've just bought it. This game has been reserved for you and will be shipped as soon as possible after we've received your payment.

If I buy an item today how long will it take before I receive it?

If you pay immediatly with bancontact or another online payment your order will be shipped within 1 working day. If you pay with bank tranfer your order will be shipped within 1 working day after we've received your payment. Once shipped you'll receive your order within 1-2 working days (longer for international shipping).

I would like to buy this game but it's no longer in stock. Can I be notified when it's back available?

Yes, of course. Just hit the "Notify me!" button and we'll send you an email once the game is back available.

The things on the website, can I also buy them in your shop?

Yes, everything on our website is also available in our shop. In our shop we also have stuff that's not (yet) on our website.

I'm looking for a game but I can't find in on the website.

Our offer changes constantly. Please keep a close eye on the category "New in stock". All the new games we list, you'll see appear in this category. Or pay a visit to our shop where we also have stuff that's not (yet) listed on our website.

I have another question.

You can ask this question by clicking the button "Ask Question" or by sending us a message through our contact form.
